SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AggresivveBuyerStrategy
AggresivveBuyerStrategy This player tries to buy every property they land on if affordable and aggressively upgrades properties once they own all of a color.
Board
Board class represents the game board, consisting of a collection of spaces.
BoardTest
Unit tests for the Board class in the Monopoly game.
CautiousSaverStrategy
CautiousSaverStrategy This strategy represents a player who is cautious with their spending.
CollectorStrategy
The CollectorStrategy class implements the Strategy interface.
DisruptiveStrategy
DisruptiveStrategy This strategy represents a player who aims to block other players by owning at least one property of each color.
Game
Game class represents the core game logic for simulating a Monopoly-style game.
GameTest
Unit tests for the Game class, ensuring that the game's initialization, player management, scenarios (such as Jail and Go to Jail), and winner determination work as expected.
GoToJail
Represents a "Go To Jail" space on the game board.
Jail
Represents the Jail space on the game board.
Main
Main class to initiate and start a Monopoly game simulation.
PlainSpace
Represents a plain space on the game board.
Player
Represents a player in the Monopoly game.
PlayerTest
Unit tests for the Player class.
Property
Represents a property space on the game board.
SimulationExperiment
Simulates a series of Monopoly games with multiple players, collecting various statistics such as wins, balances, properties owned, and houses owned across multiple trials.
Space
Represents a space on the game board.
SpaceTest
 
Strategy
 
StrategyTest
Unit tests for the various strategy implementations (AggresivveBuyerStrategy, CautiousSaverStrategy, CollectorStrategy, DisruptiveStrategy) in the Monopoly game.
UtilitySpace
Represents a utility space on the game board.
